resources.string: From here you can make an appointment with any residence monk in Pittsburgh Buddhist Center. This will helps Bhanthe to plan their calendar with have an appointment with you.
Select your date and time to have an appointment with Monk.
Select with which bhanthe you want to make an appointment with or keep it empty, available bhanthe will pick your appointment.
Select with which resident monk the appointment will schedule.
Following is the name of the devotee who requested this appointment.
Please provide a brief about you appointment. This will help bhanthe to prepare before the appointment
Select which way you are comfortable to have an appointment by Remote \/ ON-Site
Failed to create new appointment now. Please try again late.
Failed to delete the appointment now. Please try again late.
Failed to delete the appointment request now. Please try again late.
You can push this appointment into Google Calendar. This will create event in Google Calendar for this appointment and invite to all attendees too.
